work.name: Ecole Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne, EPFL
work.summary: Provide 1st level IT and administrative support for multiple (40+) systems, applications and processes. Provide onboarding and training of new hires. Prepare timesheets and hourly schedules for a team of more than 40 employees.
